lines.text: Where are those little boogers? If I was a little booger, where would I be? Mom and Dad's room!
I'm Colt because I'm fast, he's Rocky because he's solid and he's Tum-Tum because he'll eat anything.
I won't eat dog poop.

[while eating the pizza they stole]
Y'know, we should save some of this for the kids we're nabbing.
They're probably pretty nice kids.

[scene cuts]
Where are all the weapons? The sling-shot, the knife throwers?

[aiming gun at clerk]
Open up the cash register. That's right, dude, us three bone heads are sticking you up. Open up that register before I have to get nasty.
[Pager goes off]
Excuse me, sir, could I please use your telephone?
First we feast. Then we Felony!
Hold it! Before Phase 2, I got a little surprise! takes out a bottle of Lax-Go laxative
What's that stuff?
Remember last year when you were sick and couldn't take a dump for 3 days?
Yeah...
This is the stuff that makes you have to go.
Instant diarrhea.
You're sick.
Not as sick as they're gonna be. stirs spiked Coke with his finger.
Marcus, score us some nacho chips and some radical salsa.
Dude!
None of that green stuff.
Radical!
Dude!
[Grandpa is giving the boys names]
Can I be Monster Destroyer? Or how about Super Killer?
How about Super Dork?
Hey dude, what time does school get out?
I don't know. I never stayed to the end.
This kidnapping is so much better than armed robbery.
Yeah I never got a pizza on a robbery.
Okay, none of you little dudes move until those two dudes get back!
We should run.
We should hide.
We should kick their butts!
Okay, Marcia Brady or Laurie Partridge?
Rather do Laurie.
Cool. Okay, Cheryl Ladd or Farrah Fawcett?
Tanya Roberts, dude.
Kick Butt is about to commence. Synchronize watches.
What time is it?
I dunno, anybody got a watch?
Okay little dude, we know you're in here somewhere. We don't wanna hurt you, we just wanna kidnap you.
I say we kill those little boogers!
But like, I thought we wanted them alive.
I want *us* alive, dude!
Remember, never fight unless you're sure you can win.
God, I love being a bad guy.
I hate pizza.
Seems that providence has shined her light upon us boys. It's pizza time.
Two lessons you have to learn from this battle. Lesson 1, never attack unless you're gonna win?
And lesson two?
Don't climb a tree that's full of thorns. Uh!
Oh no, robbers!
Robbers? I thought we were kidnappers.
Am I a nice guy or what?
You're a geek.
We got those little dudes now, Dudes.
Grandpa is a Ninja. He will come.
I don't care who he is as long as he brings us something to eat.
Hey, what's the matter with us? Remember what Grandpa taught us? Everything around us can be our friend. Be friendly to your environment.
Oh sure, Rocky, we gonna go make the friendly door open?
Festin, don't screw this up or we'll have to kill ya.
Bummer.
We almost had you!
Had me? Oh Michael.
What?
If I hadn't have stopped the car, you would've been called 'Pancake' by now.
If you think being a Ninja's hard work, try being a mom.
Hey amigos, this is no Library you buy or you go.
Colt, what is a ninja?
A ninja is one who can use everything around him to trick his enemies. He and fast and he is friendly to his environment.
A ninja is honest and good. His mind, body and spirit are one. He has self-control. He has discipline.
A ninja loves nature, uh, 'cause he is part of nature. A ninja never fights a battle if he cannot win.
Who is it?
Pizza, ma'am.
We didn't order any pizza!
Uh, some kids called. Yeah, and if you don't pay, we'll, uh, we'll T.P. your house.

[shove pizza in Babysitter's face]
Surprise!
Ro-cky LOVES Em-il-y!
They're just kids. KIDS! I want them found NOW! Or I'll tear out your liver!
Well, my dangerous buds, tomorrow is another day. And those little dudes are ours. Slurpee?
Radical!
Slurpee?
Dude!
We're outta here.

[Emily nearly drinks a spiked soda]
No, no, no, that's diarrhea.
Alright, Samuel!
Sir!
From this day forth until forever, you will be known as Rocky. Because you are strong, solid, and cool as granite rock!

[Receives mask]
Awesome! Yeah!
Ahh, Jeffrey. Fast and free, spirit of the young wild horse; you shall be known as Colt!
Colt? That's cool.
What about me? Can I be Monster Destroyer? Or how about Super Killer?
How about Super Dork?
Shut up, spazz!
Ah, little one. Since your energy begins and ends with your tummy; you shall be known as Tum Tum!
Tum Tum!
[Both Tum Tum and Grandpa laugh]
I can't wait 'till we show these to dad!
He'll hate 'em.
